profile.headline: Final Year AI & ML Engineer | Data-Driven Innovator | Cloud & Computer Vision
profile.shortBio: AI & ML engineer with expertise in Python, SQL, data science, and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP). Experienced in computer vision, predictive modeling, and building deployable AI/ML systems. Passionate about solving real-world challenges with impactful solutions.

projects.title: AI-Driven Traffic Congestion Management
projects.summary: Developed an AI-driven system with dynamic flow optimization, emergency vehicle priority, and smart pedestrian handling. Fine-tuned YOLOv8 on 4,000+ images, achieving 97.1% mAP50. Enabled real-time inference on live CCTV streams for low-latency emergency response.
features: Real-time vehicle detection with 97.1% mAP50 accuracy
Emergency vehicle priority system with automatic lane clearing
Smart pedestrian crossing management
Multi-agent coordination between intersections
Live CCTV feed processing with <100ms latency

projects.title: Frugal Foodie: Cost-Based Restaurant Clustering
projects.summary: K-Means clustering model with Google Maps API for location-based restaurant recommendations. Achieved a Silhouette Score of 0.6. Published in JETIR.
features: K-Means clustering for restaurant grouping by cost
Google Maps API integration for location data
Silhouette Score of 0.6 for optimal clustering
FastAPI backend with responsive frontend
Published research paper in JETIR journal

projects.title: AI for Pandemic Prediction
projects.summary: Regression model predicting pandemic potential using COVID-19 data across 150+ countries. Includes Streamlit dashboard for visualization.
features: COVID-19 data analysis across 150+ countries
Regression modeling for pandemic potential prediction
Interactive Streamlit dashboard for data visualization
Statistical analysis and trend identification
Real-time data processing and insights

projects.title: Spot the Job Scam
projects.summary: ML pipeline to detect fraudulent job postings using NLP, embeddings, and classification. Preprocessing, model training, and evaluation included.
features: Natural Language Processing for text analysis
Feature extraction using embeddings and TF-IDF
Binary classification for scam detection
Comprehensive data preprocessing pipeline
Model evaluation with accuracy and precision metrics

certifications.title: Data Visualization: Empowering Business with Insights

publications.title: Frugal Foodie: A Cost-Based Restaurant Clustering
Conference Presentation
publications.publisher: 11th National Conference on Advancements in Information Technology (NCAIT), JSSATE Bengaluru
